AppDB.Name: ERPP_FORWARD_CODE_SELECTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ERPP Forwarding Context Selection TCAM Table

Field.Name: IS_TDM
Field.Description: If true, the packet is TDM

Field.Name: PACKET_IS_APPLET
Field.Description: If true, the packet is Applet

Field.Name: INGRESS_TRAPPED_BY_FHEI_TYPE
Field.Description: If true, the packet is trapped by FHEI Type

Field.Name: PPH_FORWARDING_LAYER_ADDITIONAL_INFO_MASK
Field.Description: Forwarding Layer Additional Info Mask

Field.Name: FORWARD_LAYER_TYPE_MASK
Field.Description: Mask For Forwarding Layer Type

Field.Name: TM_ACTION_TYPE_MASK
Field.Description: TM Action Type Mask

Field.Name: FORWARD_CODE_PORT_PROFILE_MASK
Field.Description: Forwarding Code Port Profile Mask

Field.Name: IS_TDM_MASK
Field.Description: TDM Mask Fields

Field.Name: PACKET_IS_APPLET_MASK
Field.Description: Applet Mask Fields

Field.Name: FORWARD_LAYER_QUALIFIER_MASK
Field.Description: Forward Layer Qualifier Mask

Field.Name: INGRESS_TRAPPED_BY_FHEI_TYPE_MASK
Field.Description: Ingress trapped by FHEI Type mask

Field.Name: VALID
Field.Description: If true, the HW table entry is Valid

AppDB.Name: ETPP_FORWARD_CODE_SELECTION

Field.Name: IS_TDM

Field.Name: INGRESS_TRAPPED_BY_FHEI_TYPE

Field.Description: Forwarding Layer Additional Info Mask

Field.Name: FORWARD_LAYER_TYPE_MASK
Field.Description: Mask For Forwarding Layer Type

Field.Name: FORWARD_CODE_PORT_PROFILE_MASK
Field.Description: Forwarding Code Port Profile Mask

Field.Description: TDM Mask Fields

Field.Name: PACKET_IS_APPLET_MASK
Field.Description: Applet Mask Fields

Field.Name: FORWARD_LAYER_QUALIFIER_MASK
Field.Description: Forward Layer Qualifier Mask

Field.Name: INGRESS_TRAPPED_BY_FHEI_TYPE_MASK

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_PER_FORWARD_CODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for Egress Forward Code general configuration

Field.Name: TERMINATION_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable forwarding header termination

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ETHERNET_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports Ethernet processing

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV4_UC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv4 UC processing

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV4_MC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv4 MC processing

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV6_UC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv6 processing

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV6_MC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports IPv6 processing

Field.Name: PROTOCOL_MPLS_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports MPLS processing

Field.Name: STP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Forward code that supports stp state filter

Field.Name: VLAN_MEMBERSHIP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable CFG Egress Membership Filter per Forward Code

Field.Name: ACCEPTABLE_FRAME_TYPE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable acceptable frame type per Forward Code

Field.Name: SPLIT_HORIZON_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable split horizon per Forward Code

Field.Name: LEARN_ENABLE_PER_FWD_CONTEXT
Field.Description: Enable learning per Forward Code

Field.Name: FWD_CONTEXT_IS_PP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enabled in case that Forward Context is PP

Field.Name: FORWARD_CODE_IPV4_OR_IPV6
Field.Description: Forward Code is Ipv4 or Ipv6

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_ETPP_GLOBAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress General Configuration Table to enable/disable logics in the design

Field.Name: DSP_RESOLUTION_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Dsp Resolution

Field.Name: IP_MC_SHOULD_BE_BRIDGE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - IP MC Should Be Bridge

Field.Name: IVE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - IVE

Field.Name: FILTERS_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Filters

Field.Name: FWD_CODE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Fwd Code

Field.Name: NWK_QOS_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - NWK QoS

Field.Name: SNIFF_EXPANSION_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - SNIFF Expansion

Field.Name: FORWARDING_PROFILE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Forwarding Profile

Field.Name: MEM_SOFT_ERR_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Memory Software Errors

Field.Name: ACE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - ACE

Field.Name: COS_REMAPPING_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - CoS Remapping

Field.Name: DSP_PROCESSING_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - DSP Processing

Field.Name: JR_TO_J2_FHEI_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 FHEI

Field.Name: INLIF_PROFILE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 Inlif Profile

Field.Name: JR_TO_J2_TTL_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - J2j2 TTL

Field.Name: FINAL_PTR_RESOLUTION_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - Final Pointer Resolution

Field.Name: PRP_PEMA_CONTEXT_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable logic - PRP Pema Context

Field.Name: ETPP_ENABLE
Field.Description: Must enabled fields to make ETPP functional

Field.Name: SOURCE_IDX_MSB
Field.Description: When source idx is invalid, the field is used as the msb of source_idx.

Field.Name: BYPASS_STAMP_FTMH_ENABLE
Field.Description: Bypass Stamp Ftmh Enable

Field.Name: ETPP_FIXED_LATENCY_EN
Field.Description: When set, ETPP Latency is fixed and set to a configurable value.

Field.Name: ETPP_FIXED_LATENCY
Field.Description: If FixedLatencyEn is set, this value will set the latency

Field.Name: NETWORK_OFFSET
Field.Description: The offset in bytes of the Network headers from the end of system headers

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_PARSER_GLOBAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress Parser Global Configurations Table

Field.Name: BLOCK_IS_ETPP
Field.Description: 0=ERPP, 1=ETPP

Field.Name: BLOCK_IS_ETPP_INV
Field.Description: 0=ERPP, 1=ETPP

Field.Name: JERICHO_FORWARD_CODE_FOR_MPLS
Field.Description: Forward code for FHEI MPLS in Jericho compatible mode

Field.Name: JERICHO_FHEI_SIZE_FOR_MPLS_POP
Field.Description: FHEI size for MPLS POP headers in Jericho Mode

Field.Name: LB_KEY_EXT_CG_1_OFFSET
Field.Description: Constant offset relative to calculated Qualifier+Layer offset

Field.Name: LB_KEY_EXT_CG_1_HEADER_IDX
Field.Description: PSG header index (0 to 4)

Field.Name: LB_KEY_EXT_CG_1_LAYER_IDX
Field.Description: PSG Layer index (0 to 3)

Field.Name: LB_KEY_EXT_CG_1_MAPPED_SIZE
Field.Description: Mapped size of LB Key Extension (3b to 5b)

Field.Name: TM_EXT_CG_1_OFFSET
Field.Description: Constant offset relative to calculated Qualifier+Layer offset

Field.Name: TM_EXT_CG_1_HEADER_IDX

Field.Name: TM_EXT_CG_1_LAYER_IDX
Field.Description: PSG Layer index (0 to 3)

Field.Name: TM_EXT_CG_1_SIZE

Field.Name: PRE_PSG_LOGIC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enables Stacking-Ptr resolve and PPMC ;Enables FTMH Mux fields edit access;Enables the access to the PPMC

Field.Name: CG_LOGIC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enables system headers containers editing;Enables PPH Base fields editing;Enables system headers size calculation

Field.Name: PPMC_ACCESS_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enables the access to the PPMC

Field.Name: NO_GLEM_ACCESS_USE_GLOBAL_OUTLIF
Field.Description: if 0 use cfg_lif_null_value

Field.Description: Decision for OutLif 1

Field.Name: OUTLIF_2_DECISION

Field.Name: OUTLIF_3_DECISION
Field.Description: Decision for OutLif 3

Field.Name: INLIF_EXTENSION_1_CONFIG

Field.Name: INLIF_EXTENSION_1_PROFILE_CONFIG
Field.Description: Inlif Extension Profile 1 Configuration Value

Field.Description: Enable VSD lookup

AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress Parser Protocols Configurations Table

Field.Name: NOF_RIFS
Field.Description: Number of RIFs

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_SYSTEM_HEADER_GENERATION_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for the System Headers Generation

Field.Name: BYTES_TO_ADD
Field.Description: System Header bytes to add

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_GLOBAL_INLIF_RESOLUTION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table Global Inlif resolution

Field.Name: IS_FORWARD_CODE_IPVX_MC
Field.Description: If true the forwarding code is IPVX MC

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_TUNNEL_ADD_HEADERS_PROF_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for the Additional Headers Profile

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_CURRENT_NEXT_PROTOCOL_MAP_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for Current Next Protocol

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_ESEM_GLOBAL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for ESEM general configuration

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_ADDITIONAL_HEADERS_MAP_TABLE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: A configuration table for the Egress Main and Additional Headers Mapping

Field.Name: START_CURRENT_NEXT_PROTOCOL_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable starting of the next protocol

Field.Name: START_CURRENT_NEXT_PROTOCOL
Field.Description: Next Protocol Information

Field.Name: ADDITIONAL_HEADERS_PACKET_SIZE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable additional Header packet size

Field.Name: ADDITIONAL_HEADERS_PACKET_SIZE
Field.Description: Additional Header Packet Size in bytes

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_FORWARDING_ADDITIONAL_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress forwarding additional info (FAI) configuration table

Field.Name: IPMC_ELIGIBLE_MAPPING
Field.Description: Specify if value eligible for ipmc fallback to bridge

AppDB.Name: EGRESS_SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Same interface filtering table

Field.Name: LIFS_EQUAL
Field.Description: Indicates the inlif is equal to the outlif

Field.Name: OUTLIF_IS_PORT
Field.Description: Indicates the outlif is Port

Field.Name: INLIF_IS_PORT
Field.Description: Indicates the inlif is Port

Field.Name: SYS_PORT_EQUAL
Field.Description: Indicates the source and destination ports are equal

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER_ENABLE
Field.Description: Same interface filter is being enabled

AppDB.Name: ERPP_FWD_CONTEXT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Forward Context Mapping - it maps the the fwd_context to same_if_filter and mtu_profile

Field.Name: MTU_PROFILE
Field.Description: Used to map the MTU Profile per fwd context

Field.Name: IN_LIF_PROFILE_JER_MODE
Field.Description: It use to map the fwd_context to inlif_profile in J-Mode

AppDB.Name: ERPP_FWD_CONTEXT_FILTER
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ERPP Filter per Forwarding Context Table

Field.Name: TDM_DISCARD
Field.Description: Enable TDM Indication per fwd context

Field.Name: RQP_DISCARD
Field.Description: Enable RQP Discard per fwd context

Field.Name: INVALID_OTM
Field.Description: Enable Invalid OTM per fwd context

Field.Name: DSS_STACKING
Field.Description: Enable DSS Stacking per fwd context

Field.Name: LAG_MULTICAST
Field.Description: Enable LAG Multicast per fwd context

Field.Name: EXCLUDE_SRC
Field.Description: Enable Exclude Src per fwd context

Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE
Field.Description: Enable Same interface per fwd context

Field.Name: UNACCEPTABLE_FRAME_TYPE
Field.Description: Enable Unacceptable frame type per fwd context

Field.Name: UNKNOWN_DA
Field.Description: Enable Unknown DA per fwd context

Field.Name: SPLIT_HORIZON
Field.Description: Enable Split Horizon per fwd context

Field.Name: GLEM_PP_TRAP
Field.Description: Enable GLEM PP Trap per fwd context

Field.Name: GLEM_NON_PP_TRAP
Field.Description: Enable GLEM NON PP Trap per fwd context

Field.Name: TTL_SCOPING
Field.Description: Enable TTL Scoping per fwd context

Field.Name: TTL_ZERO
Field.Description: Enable TTL Zero per fwd context

Field.Name: TTL_ONE
Field.Description: Enable TTL One per fwd context

Field.Name: MTU_VIOLATION
Field.Description: Enable MTU Violation per fwd context

Field.Name: IPV4_FILTERS
Field.Description: Enable IPV4 Filters per fwd context

Field.Name: IPV6_FILTERS
Field.Description: Enable IPV6 Filters per fwd context

Field.Name: LAYER_4_FILTERS
Field.Description: Enable Layer 4 Filters per fwd context

AppDB.OneLineDescription: Egress Ingress Trapped by FHEI
